description: First day of classes for Fall 2025 semester.
Last day to add or drop courses without penalty.
College closed in observance of Labor Day.
Midterm examination period. Classes may not meet during this time.
Final examination period. No classes during this time.
Last day of Fall 2025 semester. Grades posted by December 23.
Campus limited operations. Student center open limited hours.
First day of classes for Spring 2026 semester.
One week break mid-semester. Classes resume March 17.
Final day to add courses for Spring semester.
Commencement ceremony. Time and location: TBD (typically Sunday, May at 10:00 AM, Quad)
Last day of Spring 2026 semester. Grades posted by May 27.
